code: import React from"react";import{Navigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useAuth}from"../services/AuthContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProtectedRoute=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const{user,loading}=useAuth();if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center",style:{minHeight:"200px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"spinner-border",role:"status",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"visually-hidden",children:"Loading..."})})});}if(!user){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true});}return children;};export default ProtectedRoute;
